body_html: Hi, this is a good contribution to tf.contrib.rnn. can you move the class there? Also please add better documentation including literature reference in the doc string, and use contrib.layers instead of _linear. Do you have any unit tests?
body_text: Hi, this is a good contribution to tf.contrib.rnn.  can you move the class there?  Also please add better documentation including literature reference in the doc string, and use contrib.layers instead of _linear.  Do you have any unit tests?
body: Hi, this is a good contribution to tf.contrib.rnn.  can you move the class there?  Also please add better documentation including literature reference in the doc string, and use contrib.layers instead of _linear.  Do you have any unit tests?
